channel.title: Conferences on Wesley Hales

item.title: Jazoon 2010 Overview
item.description: I've always heard good things about Jazoon and I got to experience it first hand this week. Definitely one of the larger conferences based in Europe, I was impressed not only by the venue but also with the star studded line-up of talented speakers/developers. I was pleasantly surprised to see soo many talks about portal technologies. And people weren't talking about the spec or the technology itself, but about specific usecases - which is really cool.
